mapper.insert: insert into MEMBER_TBL (MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, PROVIDER, PROVIDER_ID) values (#{memberId}, #{memberPwd}, #{memberName}, #{memberEmail}, #{provider}, #{providerId})
mapper.select: select MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, JOIN_DATE, MEMBER_IMG, MEMBER_ROLE from MEMBER_TBL where MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} and PROVIDER = 'ZIP'
select MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL from MEMBER_TBL where MEMBER_EMAIL = #{memberEmail} and PROVIDER = 'ZIP'
